error.message: Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Call to deprecated constant NODE_NOT_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::NOT_PUBLISHED instead.
Call to deprecated constant NODE_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::PUBLISHED instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.

Usage of deprecated trait Drupal\Core\Routing\LinkGeneratorTrait in class Drupal\hierarchical_config\HierarchicalConfigurationListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link instead.

Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal\hierarchical_config\HierarchicalConfigurationListBuilder. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.

Parameter $entity of method Drupal\hierarchical_config\HierarchicalConfigurationService::getOverridden() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Entity. Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to hierarchical_config.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
